Package arcade.sim

Interface Simulation.Representation

All Known Implementing Classes:
HexagonalRepresentation
Enclosing interface:
Simulation
public static interface Simulation.Representation
A Representation object defines the simulation representation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Location getCenterLocation()
    Gets the center location of the simulation.
    java.util.ArrayList<Location> getInitLocations​(int radius)
    Gets a list of initialization locations for the given bounds.
    java.util.ArrayList<Location> getLocations​(int radius, int height)
    Gets a list of all locations in the simulation within the given bounds.
    Grid getNewGrid()
    Gets a new instance of a Grid for agents.
    Lattice getNewLattice​(double val)
    Gets a new instance of a Lattice for the environment.
    Location[][][] getSpanLocations()
    Gets the lattice coordinates that span the environment.

  • Method Details

    • getNewGrid

      Grid getNewGrid()
      Gets a new instance of a Grid for agents.
      Returns:
      a Grid instance

    • getNewLattice

      Lattice getNewLattice​(double val)
      Gets a new instance of a Lattice for the environment.
      Parameters:
      val - the initial value in the array
      Returns:
      a Lattice instance

    • getLocations

      java.util.ArrayList<Location> getLocations​(int radius, int height)
      Gets a list of all locations in the simulation within the given bounds.
      Parameters:
      radius - the bound on the radius
      height - the bound on the height
      Returns:
      a list of locations

    • getInitLocations

      java.util.ArrayList<Location> getInitLocations​(int radius)
      Gets a list of initialization locations for the given bounds.
      Parameters:
      radius - the bound on the initialization radius
      Returns:
      a list of locations

    • getSpanLocations

      Location[][][] getSpanLocations()
      Gets the lattice coordinates that span the environment.
      Returns:
      an array of coordinates

    • getCenterLocation

      Location getCenterLocation()
      Gets the center location of the simulation.
      Returns:
      the center locations
